howToInvest: How to Invest on the Projects?
investmentStepsDescription: Follow these simple steps to start investing in our projects.
step1Description: Sign up and verify your identity to start investing
step2Description: Browse and select investment opportunities that match your goals
step3Description: Fund your account and confirm your investment choices
step4Description: Monitor your investments and watch your portfolio grow

hero.title: Invest Today and Build Your Future
hero.description: Get easy market access and enjoy monthly returns. United States stocks and ETFs!

questions.1: Can I change my plans later?

answers.0: You get a 14-day free trial where you get access to all the features for unlimited users & clients. After the 14-day free trial, you will get the option of choosing our standard package or contacting sales to further continue using it.
